heading: Login
name: Name
upload_photo: Upload a Photo Of Your Plant's Leaf
instructions1.2: - Take a picture of a single leaf from the plant.
instructions1.3: - Make sure it is a clear image and not blurry.
instructions2.1: - Ensure there is no clutter in the background to help the model focus on the leaf.
instructions3.1: - Do not capture overlapping leaves; the model works best with a single, isolated leaf.
instructions4.1: - If you are capturing a corn plant, focus on capturing a part of the leaf, not the entire leaf.
instructions5.1: - Ensure there is sufficient lighting for a clear image.
instructions6.1: - Avoid any distortions in the image; a straightforward picture works best.
instructions7.1: - Capture the image in high resolution for accurate disease prediction.
if_healthy: Your plant is flourishing and healthy! 🌿 Keep up the great care!
